create procedure update_has_change_pending_flag(@itemTypeNameDbName nvarchar(32), @itemID char(32), @ignoreAffectedItemID char(32)) AS BEGIN DECLARE @pendingChangesCounter int
IF @itemTypeNameDbName IS NULL OR @itemTypeNameDbName = '' BEGIN SET @itemTypeNameDbName = '[' + ( select instance_data from [ITEMTYPE] where ID = ( select itemtype from [CHANGE_CONTROLLED_ITEM] where ID = @itemID ) ) + ']' END
SET @pendingChangesCounter = ( select COUNT(ai.ID) from [AFFECTED_ITEM] ai where ( ai.AFFECTED_ID = @itemID OR ai.NEW_ITEM_ID = @itemID ) AND ai.id <> @ignoreAffectedItemID AND ( EXISTS(select eeco.id from [EXPRESS_ECO] eeco where eeco.id = (select SOURCE_ID from [EXPRESS_ECO_AFFECTED_ITEM] where RELATED_ID = ai.id) AND (eeco.STATE <> N'Released' AND eeco.STATE <> N'Cancelled' OR eeco.STATE IS NULL)) OR EXISTS(select edco.id from [EXPRESS_DCO] edco where edco.id = (select SOURCE_ID from [EXPRESS_DCO_AFFECTED_ITEM] where RELATED_ID = ai.id) AND (edco.STATE <> N'Released' AND edco.STATE <> N'Cancelled' OR edco.STATE IS NULL)) OR EXISTS(select ecn.id from [ECN] ecn where ecn.id = (select SOURCE_ID from [ECN_AFFECTED_ITEM] where RELATED_ID = ai.id) AND (ecn.STATE <> N'Released' OR ecn.STATE IS NULL)) OR EXISTS(select seco.id from [SIMPLE_ECO] seco where seco.id = (select SOURCE_ID from [SIMPLE_ECO_AFFECTED_ITEM] where RELATED_ID = ai.id) AND (seco.STATE <> N'Released' AND seco.STATE <> N'Cancelled' OR seco.STATE IS NULL)) ) )
SET @pendingChangesCounter = @pendingChangesCounter + ( select top 1 COUNT(smcop.id) from [SIMPLE_MCO_PART] smcop inner join [SIMPLE_MCO] smco on smco.id = smcop.SOURCE_ID where RELATED_ID = @itemID AND (smco.STATE <> N'Released' AND smco.STATE <> N'Cancelled' OR smco.STATE IS NULL) )
DECLARE @SQLstr nvarchar(500) DECLARE @ParmDefinition nvarchar(500); SET @ParmDefinition = N'@id char(32), @count int';
SET @SQLstr = N'UPDATE ' + @itemTypeNameDbName + ' SET HAS_CHANGE_PENDING = CASE WHEN @count > 0 THEN ''1'' ELSE ''0'' END WHERE ID=@id';
EXECUTE sp_executesql @SQLstr, @ParmDefinition, @id=@itemID, @count=@pendingChangesCounter END
